title: Leonnnnna~
body:
I've been working out for you ^^

http://i.imgur.com/0xBS3YQ.jpg

(Picture by Dianamoonfall)

replies.body: {{champion:420}} "cute"
Not everyone can be 6'8" and carry around a gold weight ><
iirc someone did a thread guesstimating the height of champions. Leona was pretty tall herself. like 6 ft +... not illaoi height, but tall
Yeah, even Leona's model is taller than most other female models.

Yeah, that would mean Final Boss Veigar is taller than Jax, if we're going off model alone.

I estimate Illaoi to be 7'5, and Braum is about 7'11 to 8 feet tall. He carries around a six foot tall door, and he's about two feet taller than it.
We're not going off model alone, I was just pointing that out in addition to Leona probably being rather tall. And yea, Braum is massive lol.
Braum is the largest humanoid champion.

If you count Nautilus he comes in at 30 ft based on a graph in Reddit, Braum clocks in at 7"5.

http://i.imgur.com/c7KRXXd.png

Sauce
Who in their right mind would make a 30 foot scuba suit.

Damned if I know, he's already super sized in "A New Dawn" and according to an old JoJ entry (yes it's still canon) sizes are reduced to even the playing field so to speak on the Rift, meaning he could actually be that tall.

And the suit looks more mechanical than anything else, as plates that large would require either superhuman effort or a big ass wrestler so I'm going on a guess and assuming it's a mechanized suit that can no longer be opened.

The suit itself contains metal fillings that allow a being of smaller girth to fit inside it, the shell is mostly that bulky for protection. That being said, the plates are also expandable until they are locked, and what I'm guessing happened with Nautilus is the ooze went inside him, expanding the plates to their limit, giving him a larger appearance.

Tyler1 can but he's 6'5"

(not sorry)
Well, gotta love those kind of gals that can kick your ass^^
